summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Seedling v2 enhanced results page. All new v2 features working correctly including detailed accordion sections, pattern breakdown with all 10 categories, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Results page displays primary and secondary styles correctly (The Planner, The Thinker)
Pattern breakdown shows all 10 categories with scores and progress bars (2/3, 1/3 format)
All 6 accordion sections are present and functional (Strengths & Watch-outs, Life Patterns & Next Steps, How You Work Best, Career & Study Paths, Growth Areas, Superhero Archetype)
How You Work Best section shows Environment, Schedule, Collaboration, Tools with detailed descriptions
Career & Study Paths section displays 6 career suggestions with bullet points
Growth Areas section shows 3 growth areas with detailed 'Try this:' tips and 'Why:' explanations
Superhero Archetype section shows name (The Architect), motto, emoji (ðŸ¦¸), superpower, and impact
All accordion sections can be expanded and collapsed independently (multiple sections open simultaneously)
Accordion expand/collapse animations work smoothly
Visual design is clean and mobile-friendly with proper card stacking
Try Micro-Challenge and Restart buttons work correctly from results page
Language toggle still works on results page
Results page scrolls properly with all expanded content
Mobile responsiveness: cards stack vertically, accordions work, scrolling functions properly
Action buttons stack appropriately on mobile devices
Tablet layout maintains proper spacing and functionality
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Detailed insights data from scoring.js displays correctly in all sections
Progress bars show accurate percentages and visual representation
Strength tags display properly with rounded styling
Watch-outs show with warning icons and proper formatting
